Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
61 Sukhasahagataduka, Kusalattika
Sukhasahagataduka, Kusalattika
70.
193Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṃ kusalañca nasukhasahagataṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
194Sukhasahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṃ akusalañca nasukhasahagataṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
